entries.title: OnePlus takes on the iPad with the OnePlus Pad
entries.description: It's a midrange-ish tablet with a pen, keyboard, and aluminum body.

entries.title: Report: Sonos’ next flagship speaker will be the spatial audio-focused Era 300
Google will soon default to blurring explicit image search results
entries.description: Unless you're logged in and over 18, don't expect to find violent or racy stuff.

entries.title: Microsoft announces AI-powered Bing search and Edge browser
entries.description: ChatGPT-style AI tech brings more context to search, available today in a limited preview.

entries.title: Creation of largest US lithium mine draws closer despite protest over land use
entries.description: Thacker Pass mine considered critical to Biden’s $2 trillion clean energy plan.

entries.title: OnePlus unveils its first mechanical keyboard: Mac layout, custom switches
entries.description: Of course, it comes with homegrown switches.

entries.title: Musk says he saved Twitter from bankruptcy, but it still has big money problems
entries.description: Low Twitter Blue subscription rate, unpaid-bill lawsuits highlight money troubles.

entries.title: Google and Mozilla are working on iOS browsers that break current App Store rules
entries.description: Currently, all iOS and iPadOS browsers need to use the same engine as Safari.

entries.title: OnePlus 11 comes to the US with killer $699 price tag
entries.description: OnePlus' flagship smartphone is cheaper than it was last year.

entries.title: Mercedes-Benz’s electric eSprinter van debuts, US sales later this year
entries.description: The electric cargo van will be built in South Carolina as well as Germany.

entries.title: As Antarctic fieldwork ends, a sexual harassment reckoning looms
entries.description: A 2022 report described harassment as a “fact of life” on the continent.

entries.title: Here’s why Europe is abandoning plans to fly aboard China’s space station
entries.description: Increasingly, the European Space Agency is aligned with NASA and the West.
